memberdef.name: RUNNER_TEST
memberdef.initializer: static void runner_func_##name(struct test_context *); \ \ const struct runner_test runner_test_##name \ __attribute__ ((section ("plugin_test_section"))) = \ { \ #name, runner_func_##name \ }; \ \ static void runner_func_##name(struct test_context *ctx)

memberdef.name: runner_assert
memberdef.initializer: ({ \ bool b_ = (cond); \ if (!b_) \ runner_assert_fail(#cond, __FILE__, __LINE__, \ __func__, ctx); \ b_; \ })

memberdef.name: runner_assert_or_return
memberdef.initializer: do { \ bool b_ = (cond); \ if (!b_) { \ runner_assert_fail(#cond, __FILE__, __LINE__, \ __func__, ctx); \ return; \ } \ } while (0)

memberdef.argsstring: (struct wl_client *client, void *data, uint32_t version, uint32_t id)
memberdef.name: bind_runner

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *cond, const char *file, int line, const char *func, struct test_context *ctx)
memberdef.name: runner_assert_fail
